summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3912 for the improvement of East 57th Street from 34th Avenue Northeast to the west margin of the alley between 31st Avenue Northeast to 33rd Avenue Northeast, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47634, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
